name: r2-uploader
title: R2 Uploader
description: Cloudflare R2 uploader, easy to use.
author: zeahoo_z

commands.name: upload
commands.title: upload file
commands.description: upload file from your last clipboard

preferences.name: accessKeyId
preferences.title: Access Key ID
preferences.description: Access key Id can be found in your Cloudflare R2 token configuration

preferences.name: secretAccessKey
preferences.title: Secret Access Key
preferences.description: Secret Access Key can be found in your Cloudflare R2 token configuration

preferences.name: bucketName
preferences.title: Bucket
preferences.description: The bucket name you want to upload to

preferences.name: publicDomain
preferences.title: Custom domain
preferences.description: Custom domain for your bucket, leave it empty if you don't have one

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
